title: Background Image
label: Background Image
description: Use the background plugin to add a background image to your page.
content:
---

The background plugin allows you to add an image, gradient or color as background for your page. In this example, we have attached a full-size background-image to top, at 100% width, with fixed scroll.

  * *To add a background-image to any page, simply navigate to **page › plugins › background**.*
